title: 5 days ago i wrote a message about unfaur rank games
body:
5 days ago i wrote about rank being unfair and how i winning 5 and losing 5 games accounts for an unfair climb to s2 or higher. I get promoted to silver 3 then demoted to silver 4 after over 100 times now going back and forth between these 2 tiers having over 500 games in silver its pretty much unfair gameplay when your on a winning role and then league of legends decides to match make you with people who wanna feed and tilt, this game dosent help you with anything and in turns gives a negative impact into future players who want to play the game especially when climbing seems near impossible

Thank you for caring and hope you fix this problem as every week i keep you updated of whats going on and give feedback to people who are having the same problem

Kind regards 

Norbit

replies.body:
500 games, yikes

i climbed silver to gold in 11 games (with a 0/10 Provis btw), i fail to see an issue here, ya'll just stress because someone ints your game, i have inters too, its called ignoring them and hard carrying yourself, or alternatively, duoing with someone
You must be part of the lucky percentage of people that make it out with 10 games me i just win lose all the time and i cant do shit about it

> [{quoted}](name=NORBIT1234,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=JgGQRm7O,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-04T11:13:29.469+0000)
>
> You must be part of the lucky percentage of people that make it out with 10 games me i just win lose all the time and i cant do shit about it

No Luck to it, all you need to do is /muteall (then unmute pings because apparently that command mutes all pings too, unless someone spam pings) then have a champ you're confident on in each role and pick it every chance you get (better to have at least 6 per role i find, just in case you get pick/banned)

As a support main i fully rely on my team in most games, but i still play as if i'm the carry, thats literally all you need to do

If you're a top or mid main (who is capable of split pushing) split the minute your team starts throwing, inting or struggling to fight (because lets face it sometimes there are teams who are impossible to fight against thanks to synergies)

If you're a support main, follow whoever is doing best on your team around (not your adc, unless they're the ones doing the best), and ward every objective you can, at all points in the game at least 2 of your 3 placed wards need to be on Herald/Baron Pit and Dragon Pit

If you're an adc main, good luck
